snippet.title: A compendium of Drake's sporting allegiances
snippet.description:
A compendium of Drake's sporting allegiances by Rodger Sherman on Apr 6 2014, 3:50p
Drake is a fan of every team that is winning. Let's run down the list!

Back when he was World Wrestling Entertainment's lead play-by-play announcer, Jim Ross didn't mind surprises. As Executive VP of Talent Relations, he already knew who would win the scripted...

snippet.title: Equanimeous St. Brown, Zach Morris, and the 2015 recruiting All-Name Team
snippet.description:
Equanimeous St. Brown, Zach Morris, and the 2015 recruiting All-Name Team by Patrick Vint on Feb 12 2014, 10:44a

snippet.title: What you need to know about Olympic figure skating at the Sochi Games
snippet.description:
What you need to know about Olympic figure skating at the Sochi Games by Rodger Sherman on Feb 8 2014, 9:54a
Figure skating is America's favorite winter sport, a beautiful art form we watch because somebody coated in glitter will have her life's work shattered because she failed to land a triple axel. But...

snippet.title: Super Bowl halftime show 2014: Bruno Mars delivers
snippet.description:
Super Bowl halftime show 2014: Bruno Mars delivers by Jeff Gray on Feb 3 2014, 9:41a
Sunday's halftime performance had it all: a rocking drum solo, James Brown footwork and, of course, the Red Hot Chili Peppers jumping around shirtless.

snippet.title: They're playing basketball: An oral history of Kurtis Blow's 'Basketball' on the 30th anniversary of the groundbreaking video
snippet.description:
They're playing basketball: An oral history of Kurtis Blow's 'Basketball' on the 30th anniversary of the groundbreaking video by Patrick Sauer on Dec 11 2013, 11:23a
The intersection of hip-hop and basketball has been well-documented. Rappers want to be ballers, ballers want to be rappers, and every MC worth his salt has name-checked the NBA. From the early...

snippet.title: Breaking Madden: The Buccaneers and their 44 Greg Schianos
snippet.description:
Breaking Madden: The Buccaneers and their 44 Greg Schianos by Jon Bois on Oct 23 2013, 2:10p
Buccaneers head coach Greg Schiano is off to an 0-6 start. Clearly, he does not have enough of his esteemed "Schiano Men" on his roster. Let's release everyone on the Tampa Bay roster, replace them...

snippet.description:
The Sign Vince Young Movement has an anthem by David Roth on Oct 16 2013, 1:34p
...and, naturally, it's a repurposed Billy Joel song. You were expecting Young Jeezy?
